name: Racial or Ethnic Origin
description: Sensitive data revealing a consumer's racial or ethnic origin.

name: Religious Beliefs
description: Sensitive data revealing a consumer's religious beliefs.

name: Mental or Physical Health Diagnosis
description: Sensitive data concerning a consumer's mental or physical health diagnosis.

name: Sexual Orientation
description: Sensitive data revealing a consumer's sexual orientation.

name: Citizenship or Immigration Status
description: Sensitive data revealing a consumer's citizenship or immigration status.

name: Genetic or Biometric Data
description: Genetic or biometric data processed for the purpose of uniquely identifying a natural person.

name: Child Data
description: Personal data collected from a known child under the age of 13.

name: Precise Geolocation Data
description: Precise geolocation data identifying a consumer's location within a radius of 1,750 feet.
